thread.title: Sanctioned Russian Oligarch Deripaska Distances Himself From Rusal

author: Scott Patterson
title: Sanctioned Russian Oligarch Deripaska Distances Himself From Rusal
text:
Sanctioned Russian billionaire Oleg Deripaska agreed to sell down his majority ownership in EN+ Group PLC, the U.K.-listed holding company that owns 48% of aluminum giant United Co. Rusal.
By distancing themselves from Mr. Deripaska, widely seen as an ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin, the move could help Rusal and EN+ to escape U.S. Treasury sanctions. Mr. Deripaska was among a handful of Russian tycoons, along with their corporate assets, targeted in the latest round of U.S. sanctions as the Trump administration escalates... RELATED VIDEO Russia, a Poisoned Spy and a Global War of Words The deepening rift between Moscow and the West is raising tensions to levels not seen since the Cold War. Following a coordinated response by Western allies, scores of Russian diplomats and intelligence officers have been expelled. WSJ's Niki Blasina explains the escalating situation.
